text: Mu by’ukuri abemeramana nyabo ni ba bandi bemeye Allah n’Intumwa ye (Muhamadi). Kandi igihe bari kumwe na yo mu gikorwa kibahuza, nta ho bajya batabanje kuyisaba uruhushya. Mu by’ukuri abo bagusaba uruhushya ni bo bemera Allah n’Intumwa ye (by’ukuri). Bityo, nibaramuka bagusabye uruhushya ku bw’impamvu zabo bwite, ujye uruha uwo ushatse muri bo kandi unabasabire Allah imbabazi. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimpuhwe
